name: Daniel Shan Balico
description: I'm a software engineer specializing in full-stack web development. My expertise lies in crafting scalable, secure, and dependable web applications using a range of frameworks and technologies. I thrive on tackling intricate challenges, constantly expanding my skill set, and delivering top-notch code that adheres to the highest standards and best practices in the industry.
about_description: Hello! I'm Daniel Shan Balico, currently pursuing computer science at Technological University of the Philippines. My enthusiasm lies in software engineering, driving me to continuously explore new technologies and enhance my skill set. Here are some of the technologies I've been working with recently:

education.subtitle: ICT in Mobile App & Web Dev

experience.subtitle: Work Immersion - Web Dev

projects.title: sudoku-solver
projects.description: Sudoku Solver is a web application that can generate or solve sudoku problems using simulated annealing, an optimization algorithm.

projects.title: simple-chat-app
projects.description: A simple online chatting web application where you can create chat rooms and have a fun conversation with a group of people.

projects.title: pseudocode-to-c
projects.description: Pseudocode to C is a web app that translates pseudocode into C code, aiding in the transition from high-level logic to a lower-level language.

projects.title: probability-pick
projects.description: Probability Pick is a PCSO Lotto Number Generator that calculates the likelihood of selecting winning numbers based on historical draw data.

projects.title: draw-and-classify
projects.description: Draw & Classify is a web application designed to test my machine learning model, which classifies drawn letters, digits, or shapes.
